channel.title: How i change the ip of the client?

item.title: How i change the ip of the client?
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

[quote=“facundo, post:2, topic:323450”]go to gui.java file and look for 127.0.0.1 and change it or…go to client.java and look for 127.0.0.1 too and change it, it can be in any of tht places. then save and compile.

hope that helped.[/quote]

i did :s and it dont work

[quote=“DeltaLegitz, post:3, topic:323450”][quote author=KoF link=topic=419833.msg3084119#msg3084119 date=1262384719]
other players cant conect to my client
i dont find where i change the client ip… :s
no its not my no-ip or somthing all ok =)

[code] try {

		System.out.println("Loading client..");
		Serverip = "gproject.no-ip.info";
		sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));
		initUI();
	} [/code]

whats wrong? if i use the Z-FileSearcher he says there is a 127.0.0.1 :s but i see this =(

can anyone help me ??

thx grtz ,
KoF
[/quote]

If I get you right, Go into GUI.java search for that IP and change to yours…
Don’t forget to portforward.[/quote]

portforwarding is ok

Read full topic
item.source: How i change the ip of the client?

item.title: How i change the ip of the client?
item.dc:creator: @DeltaLegitz DeltaLegitz
item.description:
@DeltaLegitz wrote:

[quote=“KoF, post:1, topic:323450”]other players cant conect to my client
i dont find where i change the client ip… :s
no its not my no-ip or somthing all ok =)

[code] try {

		System.out.println("Loading client..");
		Serverip = "gproject.no-ip.info";
		sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));
		initUI();
	} [/code]

whats wrong? if i use the Z-FileSearcher he says there is a 127.0.0.1 :s but i see this =(

can anyone help me ??

thx grtz ,
KoF[/quote]

If I get you right, Go into GUI.java search for that IP and change to yours…
Don’t forget to portforward.

item.title: How i change the ip of the client?
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

go to gui.java file and look for 127.0.0.1 and change it or…go to client.java and look for 127.0.0.1 too and change it, it can be in any of tht places. then save and compile.

hope that helped.

Read full topic
